intro: Ervatamia hainanensis, commonly known as Hainan ervatamia, is a flowering plant native to the island of Hainan in China. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest understories, and is adapted to the tropical climate of its native region. Ervatamia hainanensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited geographic distribution.
